tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INTEGER,
    supplier_id INTEGER,
    order_date TIMESTAMP,
    quantity_ordered INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  supplier_id INT,
  order_quantity INT,
  order_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity_on_hand INT,
    reorder_point INT
)

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity_ordered INT
)

CREATE TABLE warehouses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    notification_type VARCHAR(255),
    message TEXT
)
